Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

have played Kerbal longer in past. Yesterday i have installed it again without mods. No i have a problem. I cant set a maneuver node? Left click on the flightpath of the spaceship. This didnt work.

 

I have tried out many things but nothing will work. Is there a known bug with that? Ship is a unmaned satelite at orbit of kerbal. I play the complete campaign with sience and contracts etc.

 

thx for help, and sorry about my english.

 

Myandrin

If you are playing in career mode, you will need to update your tracking station and mission control before you have access to maneuver nodes. 

Edited August 24, 2016 by Vanamonde
You saw nothing!

39 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

If you are playing in career mode, you will need to update your tracking station before you have access to maneuver nodes. 

Tracking station and Mission control, isn't it? Tracking station for the patched comics, and Mission control for flight planning.

37 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

If you are playing in career mode, you will need to update your tracking station before you have access to maneuver nodes. 

Enabling maneuver nodes requires upgrading both the Tracking Station and Mission Control.  Either one by itself is not enough.

And i tried and tried...

 

Thx you 3 for the fast answeres !

 

Greetings,

 

Myandrin
If you can set a node in a sandbox game then it's just the early career restriction mentioned above.
